Ingredients.2: 1 (18 ounce) can ready-to-serve gluten-free cream of mushroom soup (such as Progresso®)

Ingredients.3: 2 (7 ounce) cans albacore tuna packed in water, drained and flaked

Ingredients.8: 3 medium jalapeno peppers, seeded and diced

Ingredients.10: 1 (8 ounce) package processed cheese (such as Velveeta®), cubed

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Drain.

Directions.2: Stir soup and tuna together in a 9x13-inch casserole dish. Place in the oven and set to preheat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: While the oven is preheating, heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add bell pepper, zucchini, onion, and jalapeno peppers; saute until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes; don't overcook. Add cherry tomatoes for the last couple of minutes.

Directions.4: Remove casserole dish from the oven and stir in drained macaroni, and then sauteed vegetables. Stir in processed cheese.

Directions.5: Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 25 minutes, stirring halfway through.
